sdnr 42 ralloc sdnr 21 symbolcraft chart no-st knit purl օ yo ʊ m1 ʊ m1pwise skp k2tog c6left c6right prja freya pattern inctructions collar use co for an attractive elastic edge using smaller cir needle co 92 sts place marker in the middle of back and join for working in the rnds being careful not to twist sts knit in the round 4 rnds and place markers k15 back sts pm slm in the next round k16 shoulder sts pm slm in the next round k31 front sts pm slm in the next round k16 shoulder sts pm slm in the next round k14 back sts ❀ note you have 2 sts more for the front ❀ please before you start the collar read the knitting instructions until the yoke work rib 1x1 12 rnds for back and shoulder sts and work from chart rnds 1- 12 of collar work 8 incrs in the last 12 round of chart you will have on your needle total 39 front sts after incr yoke body inrc ❀ please before you knit the yoke read the knitting instructions until the next point yoke sleeve incr ❀ some clarity for body increases you make one incr before and one after the shoulder sts two incrs for back and two incrs for front total 4 incrs in the round the shoulder sts stay constant the front and back „grow knit all increased sts in the next rnds working from chart cont knit the chart on the front repeat rnds 1-24 of chart at the same time work incrs for body as follow knit with 4 incrs in the round you will make 2 incrs in back and 2 incrs in front back m1 only in
